translated: An Iberian lynx Iberian lynx, in the scrubland Name (s) joint (s) Iberian lynx, Lynx Spanish, Iberian Lynx Lynx pardinus felines Scientific name Classification Distribution Spain Living Environment Maquis and garrigue size from 0.80 to 1.30 m long, 40 to 50 cm in height at withers.
